src:
- Vi er heldige som har disse ildsjelene, uten dem hadde norsk idrett vært fattig, nærmest null
Idrettens Hederskveld 2019
01 Nov 2019, 22:13 by Richard Sagen (foto),Kristina Bye
Idrettens Hederskveld 2019 gikk av stabelen fredag. Se bilder fra arrangementet her.
text:
- We are fortunate to have these fiery souls, without them Norwegian sport would have been poor, almost zero
Sports Honors Night 2019
01 Nov 2019, 22:13 by Richard Sagen (photo), Kristina Bye
Sport's Honors Night 2019 was launched on Friday. See pictures from the event here.
